name: Kidney Parenchyma N
title: Clinical and Pathologic N
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in distant metastasis.

**Note 2:**  Regional nodes include unilateral, bilateral or contralateral involvement of named node(s).

**Regional lymph nodes:**

    Aortic, NOS:
        Lateral (lumbar)
        Para-aortic
        Periaortic
        Preaortic
        Retroaortic
     Interaortocaval    
     Pericaval, NOS
        Paracaval
        Precaval
        Retrocaval

    Renal hilar
    Retroperitoneal, NOS

**Note 3:** N1 includes single and multiple regional node(s).
footnotes: ^Definition from the updated pages from "*TNM Classification of Malignant Tumours, Seventh edition*" found at http://www.wileyanduicc.com/pdf/Corrected_pages.pdf
rows: Regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed

Unknown; regional lymph nodes not stated
Not documented in patient record

Single or multiple lymph node(s)

Regional lymph nodes, NOS
Lymph nodes, NOS

Stated as N1
